pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to COVID-19 Data Hub // Unified datasets for a better understanding of COVID-19. The package collects COVID-19 data across governmental sources, includes policy measures from 'Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker' https://www.bsg.ox.ac.uk/covidtracker, and extends the dataset via an interface to 'World Bank Open Data' https://data.worldbank.org/, 'Google Mobility Reports' https://www.google.com/covid19/mobility/, 'Apple Mobility Reports' https://www.apple.com/covid19/mobility.
